You can have one day a week in which to give free rein to your desires. If 80% of your diet is healthy, in the remaining percentage you can satisfy your cravings. That is why a balanced diet is recommended in order to have long-term results. Strict diets bring immediate results, but then the fattening process will follow.

Try to do sports at least three times a week, between 40 and 60 minutes. Regular physical activity helps you retain key mental skills throughout your life. These skills are extremely important and include critical thinking, learning or memory. It also reduces stress, depression and improves sleep quality.
The benefits of morning sports: energy all day, improves good mood, supports the quality of sleep, keeps blood sugar under control, increases testosterone and cortisol levels.

15 minutes of warm-up are recommended before any workout, so that no pain occurs later. You can start by warming up your upper body, with movements of your neck and head and rotations of your arms and abdomen. The gluteal and abdominal muscles can be warmed up by bending forward, trying to touch the tips of the toes with your hands. By doing these exercises you will also warm your leg muscles, but, also in this sense, you can do some push-ups or stretches. And skipping rope or cardio exercises can be done for warm-up. If, however, muscle fever occurs, you should not stop. Try an hour of yoga, instead of an intense workout and you will feel better.

After the intense work of all the muscles, they must also relax. For this you can do some stretching exercises, which helps the body regain its elasticity. Stretching involves stretching movements, but also the observance of certain rules. You need to relax, to control your breathing and hold each position for about 15-30 seconds.

You can have one day a week in which to give free rein to your desires. If 80% of your diet is healthy, in the remaining percentage you can satisfy your cravings. That is why a balanced diet is recommended in order to have long-term results. Strict diets bring immediate results, but then the fattening process will follow.

Proportion of the plate: learn to have protein (chicken, fish, eggs) as much as your palm, carbohydrates (sweet potatoes, brown rice, hummus, beans) as much as your fist, vegetables as big as 2 fists, and fat as much as a finger. Protein helps the muscles to recover and lose weight because feeding the body with protein the feeling of hunger disappears.

Three main meals and two snacks will speed up your metabolism and burns in your body, and this will help you achieve the results you want. You should not have meals at fixed hours, it is recommended to eat every 2 hours. In the evening you need to eat 2 hours before bed to have a good night\'s sleep.
The abdomen is worked in the kitchen due to caloric deficit. In vain you will do exercises that work the abdomen, there will be muscles under fat that will not be visible.
Prioritize your sleep, it influences the weight loss process.
It is recommended to consume water between 2–4 l per day, depending on the height, about 2 cups per hour.
There is no "I want to lose weight from a certain area of the body"

You can\'t lose weight in isolation, there are no pine exercises to lose weight on a certain part of the body. In order to lose weight, it is necessary to have a caloric deficit, and then through sports to burn calories and shape the body.
Replace honey and sugar with agave syrup or maple syrup. Replace normal salt with Himalayan salt; it does not bring so much water retention. Replace the bread with rice slices.
It is recommended to drink a cup of green tea a day. It is an antioxidant, helps the kidneys and liver to detoxify the body, but you won\'t just lose weight with green tea.
If you feel without energy, try to consume: magnesium, spirulina, collagen or vitamin C + Zinc.
